headline: The Battle Over Covid Vaccines Hits A Fever Pitch As RFK-Picked Panel Makes Its Debut
summary: The reworked ACIP is making its debut. On Friday, the panelists weigh the suite of new Covid vaccines from Pfizer, Moderna and Novavax.

raw.headline: The Battle Over Covid Vaccines Hits A Fever Pitch As RFK-Picked Panel Makes Its Debut

headline: Formation Bio Expands Leadership Team With Top Biotech and Pharma Executives to Accelerate AI-Driven Drug Development
summary: Formation Bio, the AI-native pharmaceutical company revolutionizing drug development, today announced the appointment of four world-class leaders to its senior team: Louis Brenner, MD, as Chief Medical Officer; Daniel Neil, PhD, as Chief Technology Officer; and seasoned industry veterans Frank D'Amelio and Dashyant Dhanak, PhD, as Senior Advisors and members of our Investment Advisory Committee, alongside Mikael Dolsten MD, PhD. All of these leaders join the core group of executives at Formation

headline: Can CorMedix's Melinta Deal Fuel Growth Via Portfolio Diversification?
summary: CRMD's $300M Melinta buy adds seven therapies, easing reliance on DefenCath sales and bolstering growth in hospital-focused markets.

headline: Atlassian to acquire developer productivity platform DX for $1 billion
summary: Enterprises have ramped up funding in AI capabilities as they compete to leverage the technology for innovation, operational efficiency, and competitive advantage.  In a move underscoring this trend, Atlassian earlier this month announced a $610 million deal to acquire The Browser Company, the maker of AI-powered Dia and Arc browsers.  Most of DX's enterprise customers such as Pfizer, Pinterest and Xero also use Atlassian to plan and track their work, CEO Mike Cannon Brookes said in a blog.

raw.headline: Atlassian to acquire developer productivity platform DX for $1 billion

Most of DX's enterprise customers such as Pfizer, Pinterest and Xero also use Atlassian to plan and track their work, CEO Mike Cannon Brookes said in a blog.

headline: Neumirna Therapeutics Appoints Ellen K. Donnelly as Chief Executive Officer
summary: COPENHAGEN, Denmark, September 18, 2025--Neumirna Therapeutics, a biotechnology company developing RNA-based therapies for neurological diseases, today announced the appointment of Ellen K. Donnelly, Ph.D. as Chief Executive Officer.

headline: 1 Large-Cap Stock Worth Your Attention and 2 We Find Risky
summary: Large-cap stocks are known for their staying power and ability to weather market storms better than smaller competitors. However, their sheer size makes it more challenging to maintain high growth rates as they’ve already captured significant portions of their markets.

raw.headline: 1 Large-Cap Stock Worth Your Attention and 2 We Find Risky
raw.summary: Large-cap stocks are known for their staying power and ability to weather market storms better than smaller competitors. However, their sheer size makes it more challenging to maintain high growth rates as they’ve already captured significant portions of their markets.
